messages.name: EldenForm_allcraft
messages.explanation: When checked, all craftable item recipes are unlocked without requiring cookbooks
messages.english_text: Unlock all craftable items in Crafting Kit from the start
messages.text: 开局在制作道具栏内解锁全部可制作物品

messages.name: EldenForm_allitem0
messages.explanation: Explanation for regular item placement for 0 bias%, unweighted randomization
messages.english_text: All eligible locations for items are equally likely.
messages.text: 物品在所有符合条件的位置等可能分布。

messages.name: EldenForm_allitem1
messages.explanation: Explanation for regular item placement at low bias%, slightly weighted
messages.english_text: Most eligible locations for items are equally likely.
messages.text: 物品在大多数符合条件的位置等可能分布。

messages.name: EldenForm_allitem2
messages.explanation: Explanation for regular item placement at medium bias%. Desirable items are placed later in the game, or hidden, or dropped by hard bosses
messages.english_text: Better rewards for difficult and late locations.
messages.text: 高难与后期区域将会生成较好的奖励。

messages.name: EldenForm_allitem3
messages.explanation: Explanation for regular item placement at high bias%, which is medium but moreso
messages.english_text: Much better rewards for difficult and late locations.
messages.text: 高难与后期区域将会生成更好的奖励。

messages.name: EldenForm_allmaps
messages.explanation: Checkbox for mode where the player does not have to collect map fragments or visit places for them to show up on the map
messages.english_text: Unlock all map fragments and icons at the start
messages.text: 开局解锁全部地图碎片与图标

messages.name: EldenForm_biasGroup
messages.explanation: Label for number slider from 0% to 100% which changes randomization from uniform (anything can go anywhere) to weighted (more key item chaining and more preference for later/difficult locations)

messages.name: EldenForm_bossbgm
messages.explanation: When checked, background music for bosses will be randomly swapped with background music from other bosses. (to be implemented)

messages.name: EldenForm_bosshp
messages.explanation: When checked, non-boss enemies can have their HP increased when they become boss enemies (e.g. Crab the Fell Omen)
messages.english_text: Increase HP for regular enemies as bosses
messages.text: 提高常规敌人作为BOSS时的生命值

messages.name: EldenForm_changestats
messages.explanation: When randomizing starting classes, this setting gives a small chance for changing starting class stats to allow wielding more weapons. For instance, it could increase the Astrologer's strength from 8 to 11 so it can wield the Bastard Sword.
messages.english_text: Allow changing stats slightly for more starting weapons
messages.text: 允许小幅调整职业初始属性以适配更多的初始武器

messages.name: EldenForm_confirmCreatePreset
messages.explanation:
Confirm prompt to write a preset file from an options file. {0} is the file name. 
 means to insert a newline - do not put spaces around it.

messages.name: EldenForm_confirmOverwritePreset
messages.explanation: Same as confirmCreatePreset, but when the file already exists

messages.name: EldenForm_convenienceGroup
messages.explanation: Label for options in the Misc tab which allow changes to the game to make playthroughs more convenient and straightforward, unrelated to randomization

messages.name: EldenForm_crawl
messages.explanation: Secondary option after EldenForm_fog, which allows item/enemy randomizer to be used with the 'Fog Gate Randomizer' mod, particularly its 'Dungeon Crawl' mode which restricts items to not-open-world locations. So far Fog Gate Randomizer doesn't have localization.
messages.english_text: Dungeon Crawl mode in Fog Gate Randomizer
messages.text: 启用雾门随机生成器中的地下城爬行者模式

messages.name: EldenForm_customGroup
messages.explanation: Label for enemy randomizer options for custom enemy distribution

messages.name: EldenForm_default_boss
messages.explanation: When checked, bosses with achievements can have important items. Currently this cannot be disabled

messages.name: EldenForm_default_bossL
messages.explanation: Explanation for default_boss. {0} is a number like 40. A 'check' is randomizer terminology for an item to pick up, boss to defeat, etc.
messages.english_text: Approx {0} checks. Includes all bosses which have achievements

messages.name: EldenForm_default_custom
messages.explanation: When checked, enables customizing enemy placement through PresetEditForm

messages.name: EldenForm_default_health
messages.explanation: Response to healthGroup (Flask upgrades randomized?) which places Golden Seeds/Sacred Tears anywhere

messages.name: EldenForm_default_key
messages.explanation: Response to keyGroup (Key items randomized?) which places key items in important locations

messages.name: EldenForm_default_reroll
messages.explanation: Checkbox under seed number which generates a new seed every time 'Randomize' is clicked, instead of using the existing seed

messages.name: EldenForm_default_twohand
messages.explanation: Radio button under starting class randomization which allows starting with weapons which require two-handing to use (slightly under real strength requirements)
messages.text: 允许使用双手共持才能满足力量要求的武器

messages.name: EldenForm_default_upgrades
messages.explanation: Response to healthGroup (Upgrade Bell Bearings randomized?) which places them anywhere

messages.name: EldenForm_defaultRerollEnemy
messages.explanation: Checkbox under enemy-specific seed number which behaves like default_reroll for the enemy randomizer seed

messages.name: EldenForm_earlylegacy
messages.explanation: Checkbox for mode where the items to enter Stormveil and Raya Lucaria are available early
messages.english_text: Early legacy dungeons are available early
messages.text: 允许提前进入早期的箱庭区域

messages.name: EldenForm_earlylegacyL
messages.explanation: Explanation for earlylegacy, talking about Rusty Key and Academy Glintstone Key
messages.english_text: Place Rusty Key in Limgrave and Academy Key in Liurnia
messages.text: 在宁姆格福生成生锈钥匙|在利耶尼亚生成学院钥匙

messages.name: EldenForm_editnames
messages.explanation: When checked
messages.text: 编辑BOSS名称(中文暂无法应用)

messages.name: EldenForm_enemyPage
messages.explanation: Main checkbox and tab for Enemy Randomizer. This is not replaced yet.

messages.name: EldenForm_enemyPreviewL
messages.explanation: Text explaining that enemy randomizer is not available yet
messages.english_text:
Implementation in progress!

Check the mod page for updates. Join the
FromSoft Randomizer Dev discord server for
feedback and early testing.
messages.text:
功能锐意开发中！

检查mod页面以获取更新。加入
FromSoft Randomizer Dev discord服务器
以便进行反馈并参与早期测试。

messages.name: EldenForm_enemyseedError
messages.explanation: Error message for enemy randomizer seed (not a number, too many digits, etc.)

messages.name: EldenForm_enemyseedL
messages.explanation: Label for enemy randomizer seed textbox

messages.name: EldenForm_enemyseedPlaceholder
messages.explanation: Placeholder text in the enemy randomizer seed textbox when it's empty. By default, if not specified, the enemy randomizer seed is just the same as the overall seed

messages.name: EldenForm_enemyWarningL
messages.explanation: Note in enemy tab about stability of the randomizer. This advice may change over time. Quitting to main menu does usually make sounds load in better.
messages.english_text: Warning: Placing too many bosses in the game may result in crashes and frame rate drops. Also, if enemies stop making sounds, you can usually save+quit to remedy this.
messages.text:
警告：游戏中放置过多BOSS可能导致掉帧乃至游戏崩溃。
PS：如果敌人停止出声，可尝试保存+退出以进行挽救。

messages.name: EldenForm_exeButton
messages.explanation: Label for button to open file select for eldenring.exe

messages.name: EldenForm_extraRandomGroup
messages.explanation: Label for options in Misc tab which allow randomization other than item and enemy randomization

messages.name: EldenForm_fileCopyOodleError
messages.explanation: Error message when a dll in the game directory cannot be found and the user must locate it themselves. This dll is needed to unpack game files, and randomizer needs it, but for copyright reasons it's not distributed inside the randomizer zip
messages.english_text:
Error: Oodle not found
Copy oo2core_6_win64.dll from your game directory into the randomizer directory
messages.text:
错误：未找到Oodle
请从游戏目录将oo2core_6_win64.dll文件复制到随机生成器目录下

messages.name: EldenForm_fileExeEmptyError
messages.explanation: Validation error when the exe textbox is empty
messages.text: 错误：未提供游戏exe启动文件

messages.name: EldenForm_fileExeMissingError
messages.explanation: Validation error when the exe textbox is not empty but the file referenced does not actually exist
messages.english_text: Error: Game exe does not exist
messages.text: 错误：游戏exe启动文件不存在

messages.name: EldenForm_fileMissingRegulationError
messages.explanation: Validation error when the exe textbox directory does not contain a required game file, regulation.bin
messages.english_text: Error: Invalid game exe (cannot find regulation.bin in game directory)
messages.text: 错误：无效的游戏exe启动文件（在游戏目录中找不到regulation.bin）

messages.name: EldenForm_fileOodleMissingError
messages.explanation: Validation error when the exe textbox directory does not contain a required game file, oo2core_6_win64.dll (see also fileCopyOodleError)
messages.english_text: Error: Invalid game exe (cannot find oo2core_6_win64.dll in game directory)
messages.text: 错误：无效的游戏exe启动文件（在游戏目录中找不到oo2core_6_win64.dll）

messages.name: EldenForm_fileUnpackError
messages.explanation: Error usually encountered when the randomizer exe is run from 7zip etc, without unpacking it. (In the future, this message may be copied inside the program itself, because messages are themselves in metadata files)
messages.english_text:
Error: Can't find required metadata files.
For the randomizer to work, you must unpack it to disk and keep all of the files together
messages.text:
错误：无法找到所需的元数据文件。
想要运行随机生成器，必须将所有文件解压到磁盘同一位置

messages.name: EldenForm_fileUnpackError
messages.explanation: Error usually encountered when the randomizer exe is run from 7zip etc, without unpacking it. This is a more detailed version compared to before, where {0} is the name of the directory, which is diste in the case of Elden Ring, and {1} contains the full path the randomizer is running from and expects to find the directory. To reproduce this error message, you can delete the diste directory yourself, or you can open the zip file in 7-Zip and click the exe without extracting it. (In the future, this message may be copied inside the program itself, because messages are themselves in metadata files.)
messages.english_text:
Error: Required metadata directory "{0}" not found at {1}
First use "Extract here" on the entire zip file, then run the program from inside of the extracted "randomizer" directory. Do not drag-and-drop individual files.
messages.text:
错误：无法在{1}找到所需的元数据目录“{0}”。
请将整个zip文件解压到磁盘并从“randomizer”目录内运行，不要在压缩文件内运行或只解压单个文件。

messages.name: EldenForm_fileUxmPatchWarning
messages.explanation: Validation warning for game exe textbox. A file that usually indicates the user did UXM Patch does not exist
messages.english_text: Warning: UXM output is selected, but the game may not be patched (_backup\eldenring.exe not found)
messages.text: 警告：已选择为UXM输出，但游戏可能尚未patch（未找到_backup\eldenring.exe）

messages.name: EldenForm_fileUxmUnpackError
messages.explanation: Validation error for the game exe textbox. When the user does UXM Unpack, it adds directories with game data which must exist
messages.english_text: Error: UXM output is selected, but the game is not unpacked (event subdirectory not found)
messages.text: 错误：已选择为UXM输出，但游戏尚未解包（未找到event子目录）

messages.name: EldenForm_fixedseedL
messages.explanation: Label for seed number textbox. 'Overall' means it's for both item and enemy randomizer, in the future

messages.name: EldenForm_fog
messages.explanation: Misc option which allows item/enemy randomizer to be used with the 'Fog Gate Randomizer' mod by placing any item in any area, regardless of the normal game order. So far Fog Gate Randomizer doesn't have localization.
messages.english_text: Unrestricted item placement for Fog Gate Randomizer
messages.text: 雾门随机生成器的物品摆放位置不受限制

messages.name: EldenForm_fogL
messages.explanation: Additional note for Fog Gate Randomizer option. If the mode is enabled, item/enemy randomizer can't be used on its own, but should be merged into Fog Gate Randomizer after
messages.english_text: Only use this if you're installing Fog Gate Randomizer after
messages.text: 仅在你安装了雾门随机生成器后适用

messages.name: EldenForm_healthGroup
messages.explanation: Label asking how to randomize Golden Seeds/Sacred Tears
messages.text: 圣杯瓶升级素材（黄金种子/圣杯露滴）随机化？

messages.name: EldenForm_hintGroup
messages.explanation: Label for options which show hints and item locations inside the game

messages.name: EldenForm_impolite
messages.explanation: Checkbox to change enemy AI behavior, so that enemies gang up on the player in larger groups, instead of staying back. Added for Enemy Onslaught mode, but can work in all modes

messages.name: EldenForm_impoliteL
messages.explanation: Explanation label for 'Impolite enemies'
messages.english_text: Make enemies less passive in groups
messages.text: 敌人将不会部分摸鱼，而是一起群殴玩家

messages.name: EldenForm_invertenvbgm
messages.explanation: When checked, ambient background music in levels can be swapped with each other, so you could hear Leyndell music while wandering around in Limgrave

messages.name: EldenForm_invertgestures
messages.explanation: When checked, all starting gestures and unlockable gestures will be swapped with each other (except the one in Blaidd's quest)
messages.text: 随机肢体动作(布莱泽任务动作除外)

messages.name: EldenForm_invertoutfits
messages.explanation: Option to change clothes of NPC human models, such as Gideon and Fia, to a random armor set

messages.name: EldenForm_invertstarting
messages.explanation: Option to change starting class armor and weapons, followed by additional options on allowed weapons

messages.name: EldenForm_itemPage
messages.explanation: Main checkbox and tab for Enemy Randomizer. This is not replaced yet.

messages.name: EldenForm_keyGroup
messages.explanation: Label asking how to randomize key items

messages.name: EldenForm_keyitem0
messages.explanation: Explanation for key item placement for 0 bias%, unweighted randomization
messages.english_text: Key items may be in locations that don't require completing much of the game.
messages.text: 关键物品可能出现在不需要完成多少游戏进度的位置。

messages.name: EldenForm_keyitem1
messages.explanation: Explanation for key item placement for low bias%. Multiple key items are less likely to be placed in the same area, and more likely to be placed in an area unlocked by a different key item.
messages.english_text: Key items will usually be in different areas and depend on each other.
messages.text: 关键物品通常出现在不同区域并相互依赖。

messages.name: EldenForm_keyitem2
messages.explanation: Explanation for key item placement for medium bias%, low but moreso
messages.english_text: Key items will usually be in different areas and form interesting chains.
messages.text: 关键物品通常出现在不同区域并形成有趣的链式关系。

messages.name: EldenForm_keyitem3
messages.explanation: Explanation for key item placement for high bias%, medium but moreso
messages.english_text: Key items will usually form long chains across different areas.
messages.text: 关键物品通常会在多个区域形成长链式关系。

messages.name: EldenForm_languageL
messages.explanation: Label for dropdown box to select randomizer UI language

messages.name: EldenForm_launchButton
messages.explanation: Button in randomizer to try to start the game Elden Ring when it's installed on Steam and Mod Engine can be used

messages.name: EldenForm_launchFailed
messages.explanation: Long error essage for debugging 'Launch Elden Ring' failing. It suggests basic prerequisites for using Mod Engine, and otherwise, suggests using the two other installation options, manual Mod Engine or UXM.
messages.english_text:
Automatic Mod Engine launcher appeared to fail.

Make sure Steam is running. If the game is currently running, close it and wait until it is fully shut down.

Check Troubleshooting on https://www.nexusmods.com/eldenring/mods/428/ to see when Mod Engine might fail. You may need to try using a manual Mod Engine launcher or UXM installation.
messages.text:
ModEngine启动失败。

确保steam正在运行。如果游戏目前正在运行，请将其关闭并等到它完全关闭。

当ModEngine启动出现问题时，登陆 https://www.nexusmods.com/eldenring/mods/428/ 以检查并排除问题。

或者你可能需要使用单独的ModEngine亦或使用UXM解包安装。

messages.name: EldenForm_launchFailedTitle
messages.explanation: Title of the dialog box with launchFailed

messages.name: EldenForm_launchFog
messages.explanation: Dialog box shown when clicking launchButton when Fog Gate Randomizer option is checked. This option requires merging item/enemy randomizer into a different mod, rather than launching it on its own.
messages.english_text: If you're using Fog Gate Randomizer (under Misc Options), launch the game from FogMod.exe, not from here
messages.text: 如果你正在使用雾门随机生成器（位于"杂项设置"下），请从"FgoMod.exe"启动，而不是从这里启动。

messages.name: EldenForm_launchMismatch
messages.explanation: Dialog box shown to confirm 'Launch Elden Ring' when the launch files are different from the currently selected options.
messages.english_text: Randomizer options appear to be changed from the last time randomizer was run. Launch anyway?
messages.text: 与上次随机生成器运行时相比，随机生成器的设置似乎发生了改变，是否仍要启动？

messages.name: EldenForm_launchRunning
messages.explanation: dialog box shown to confirm 'Launch Elden Ring' when it's alrady running. As part of automatic Mod Engine launcher usage, it can't launch the game if it's already running according to Steam
messages.english_text: Elden Ring appears to be already running, so launching with Mod Engine will have no effect. Try anyway?
messages.text: 游戏似乎正在运行，所以启动ModEngine不会产生任何影响，是否仍要尝试？

messages.name: EldenForm_loadOptionsFileToolStripMenuItem
messages.explanation: Action in the Options menu for selecting an options file to set all randomizer options

messages.name: EldenForm_loadOptionsFileToolStripMenuItem
messages.explanation: Action in the Options menu for selecting an options file to set all randomizer options

messages.name: EldenForm_locationGroup
messages.explanation: Label for a bunch of options to enable or disable various game locations having important items in them

messages.name: EldenForm_locationGroup
messages.explanation: Label for a bunch of options to enable or disable various game locations having important items in them
messages.text: 将哪些位置作为重要位置？

messages.name: EldenForm_locationOverviewL
messages.explanation: Some additional text to display next to the 'Important locations' section to explain what the checkboxes do
messages.english_text: Important locations are places you may need to check to find items required to beat the game.
messages.text: PS：重要位置指的是那些可能需要你进行调查并找到通关所需物品的位置。

messages.name: EldenForm_markareas
messages.explanation: Checkbox to modify Kalé's menu to spend runes to mark overall areas with required items (like Limgrave, Altus Tunnel, Leyndell) on the map
messages.english_text: Purchase markers for required areas from Kalé
messages.text: 可于伽列处购买显示物品所在区域的标记

messages.name: EldenForm_markareasL
messages.explanation: Explanation for when you can buy hint markers in-game from Kalé
messages.english_text: Markers are unavailable before reaching Altus Plateau
messages.text: 抵达亚坛高原前无法购买标记

messages.name: EldenForm_markitems
messages.explanation: Extension to markareas which also allows you to spend runes to mark the exact location of an item (the corpse to loot, or the boss that drops it)
messages.english_text: Purchase markers for exact item locations from Kalé
messages.text: 可于伽列处购买显示物品所在明确位置的标记

messages.name: EldenForm_mats
messages.explanation: Checkbox to move around items with 'Acquire materials' pickup prompt
messages.english_text: Randomize collectible materials like Rowa Fruit
messages.text: 随机化如罗亚果实等收集材料

messages.name: EldenForm_matsL
messages.explanation: Explanation for 'mats' checkbox. Currently this randomization doesn't happen across the entire game, only within maps.
messages.english_text: Move materials nearby their original location
messages.text: 将材料移动到它们原始位置的附近

messages.name: EldenForm_mergeButton
messages.explanation: Button to open a file select dialog for an alternate file-based mod to merge

messages.name: EldenForm_mergeButton
messages.explanation: Button to open a file select dialog for an alternate file-based mod to merge. Previously 'Select other mod'

messages.name: EldenForm_mergemods
messages.explanation: Checkbox to incorporate existing modifications to regulation.bin (game params) into the randomizer's output

messages.name: EldenForm_mergemods
messages.explanation: Checkbox to incorporate existing modifications to game files into the randomizer's output. Previously only merged param (regulation.bin) mods

messages.name: EldenForm_miscGroup
messages.explanation: Label for miscellaneous options with no other grouping. These usually add non-randomizer-related conveniences

messages.name: EldenForm_miscGroupEnemy
messages.explanation: Label for set of options with miscellaneous enemy randomizer options

messages.name: EldenForm_miscPage
messages.explanation: Tab page title for miscellaneous options which apply outside of item/enemy randomization

messages.name: EldenForm_multcolor
messages.explanation: Checkbox to change the color of a boss when it is duplicated, to keep track of which is which. Like if there are 2 Margits at once, one is blue and the other is red.
messages.text: 为敌人倍增模式中BOSS添加色标色码(同一BOSS不同个体作区分)

messages.name: EldenForm_multhp
messages.explanation: Checkbox to reduce HP for bosses when they are multiplied using Enemy Onslaught mode
messages.english_text: Reduce HP for bosses in Enemy Onslaught
messages.text: 在敌人倍增模式中降低BOSS的生命值

messages.name: EldenForm_multhp
messages.explanation: Checkbox to reduce HP for bosses when they are multiplied using Enemy Onslaught mode (like 2x becomes around 70% health each, 3x becomes around 57% health each)
messages.english_text: Reduce HP for bosses in Enemy Onslaught slightly
messages.text: 在敌人倍增模式中根据倍数逐渐降低BOSS的生命值

messages.name: EldenForm_nerfgargoyles
messages.explanation: Checkbox to disable poison-over-time damage while in Valiant Gargoyle's poison cloud, but it can still poison you
messages.english_text: Disable damage tick in Valiant Gargoyles' poison cloud
messages.text: 关闭英雄石像鬼的毒雾的持续伤害(仍会中毒)

messages.name: EldenForm_nerfmalenia
messages.explanation: Checkbox to disable Malenia healing when she hits you
messages.english_text: Disable heal-on-hit by a late-game boss
messages.text: 禁用某个后期BOSS(女武神)的吸血特效

messages.name: EldenForm_nerfmalenia
messages.explanation: Checkbox to disable Malenia healing when she hits you
messages.text: 禁用女武神的吸血特效

messages.name: EldenForm_nerfsh
messages.explanation: Misc option which doesn't allow Serpent-Hunter (weapon to defeat Rykard) to be upgraded, leaving it stuck at +0. This is for balancing in races, since it's a very powerful weapon.

messages.name: EldenForm_night
messages.explanation: When checked, bosses which only spawn at night (Night's Calvalry, Bell Bearing Hunters, etc.) can have important items. Only if raceloc_altboss is enabled

messages.name: EldenForm_nightL
messages.explanation: Label for 'night' checkbox. {0} is a number like 10, and is 'additional' with the 'all bosses' label

messages.name: EldenForm_nocaves
messages.explanation: When checked, location in mini-dungeons *cannot* have important items
messages.english_text: Exclude caves, graves, catacombs, and tunnels
messages.text: 排除洞窟，地下墓地，英雄墓地，及坑道

messages.name: EldenForm_nocavesL
messages.explanation: Explanation for nocaves. This option overrides other options and causes the UI to update accordingly.
messages.english_text: Exclude mini-dungeons from all of the above locations
messages.text: 在上述位置中排除小型箱庭

messages.name: EldenForm_nohand
messages.explanation: Radio button for starting class randomization: if chosen, all starting class stat requirements are completely ignored, and the player may start with a weapon or spell they do not have the stats to use
messages.text: 允许使用不满足属性要求的武器和魔法/祷告

messages.name: EldenForm_norandom
messages.explanation: Response to keyGroup (Key items randomized?) which does not randomize key items

messages.name: EldenForm_norandom_health
messages.explanation: Response to healthGroup (Flask upgrades randomized?) which does not randomize Golden Seeds/Sacred Tears

messages.name: EldenForm_norandom_upgrades
messages.explanation: Response to healthGroup (Upgrade Bell Bearings randomized?) which does not randomize them

messages.name: EldenForm_onehand
messages.explanation: When *unchecked*, character creation weapons can require two-handing with starting stats. When checked, weapons are more restricted.
messages.text: 禁用双手共持才能满足力量要求的武器

messages.name: EldenForm_onehand
messages.explanation: Radio button in starting class randomization, which restricts weapons to the starting strength requirement stats, as opposed to requiring two-handing.
messages.text: 仅允许使用单手满足力量要求的武器

messages.name: EldenForm_optionwindow
messages.explanation: Button to open dialog box to set all options (checkboxes, seed, etc.) from a text string
messages.text: 由文本字符串设置选项...

messages.name: EldenForm_overviewL
messages.explanation: Long explanation with an overview of the mod. Mainly this points people to the mod page (or README.txt file), plus the spoiler_logs directory
messages.english_text: Check the mod page or README for a full list of all key items, important locations, and other details. Find hints and spoilers for item locations in the spoiler_logs directory.
messages.text:
◆查看mod页面或README以获知关键物品，重要位置，以及其他内容的完整列表。
◆查看spoiler_logs目录以获得物品所在位置提示。

messages.name: EldenForm_phasehp
messages.explanation: Checkbox to scale the health of multi-phase bosses which are normally part of one healthbar. Fire Giant p1 becoming Margit would be scaled up slightly (around 140%), but Margit becoming Fire Giant p1 would be scaled down slightly (around 70%)
messages.text: 按BOSS难度提高/降低混合型BOSS的生命值(多阶段BOSS战)

messages.name: EldenForm_placementGroup
messages.explanation: Label for checkboxes with broad randomization options, like what to randomize and which routing to allow

messages.name: EldenForm_preset
messages.explanation: Button to select custom randomization, especially with enemy randomizer. This feature is not yet implemented

messages.name: EldenForm_presetButton
messages.explanation: Label for a button to open EditPresetForm for enemy customization (replaces EldenForm_preset)

messages.name: EldenForm_presetFileError
messages.explanation: Error message that the user tried to edit enemy placement but a necessary file did not exist or had an invalid format
messages.english_text: Error: failed to load file required for customization
messages.text: 错误：无法加载自定义所需的文件

messages.name: EldenForm_progressGroup
messages.explanation: Label for checkboxes with broad randomization options, like what to randomize and which routing to allow

messages.name: EldenForm_progressGroupEnemy
messages.explanation: Label for set of options related to tuning game difficulty in enemy randomizer

messages.name: EldenForm_raceloc_altboss
messages.explanation: When checked, enemies with a boss healthbar can important items, not just achievement bosses

messages.name: EldenForm_raceloc_altbossL
messages.explanation: Further explanation for raceloc_altboss. {0} is a number like 100 and it depends on the nocaves option
messages.english_text: Approx {0} checks. Includes fights with boss healthbars (except Patches)
messages.text: {0}个点位。包括所有拥有BOSS血条的BOSS（除了帕奇）

messages.name: EldenForm_raceloc_health
messages.explanation: When checked, trees which normally have Golden Seeds and churches which normally have Sacred Tears can have important items
messages.english_text: Golden Seed trees and Sacred Tear Churches
messages.text: 黄金种子树与圣杯露滴教堂

messages.name: EldenForm_raceloc_healthL
messages.explanation: Further explanation for raceloc_health. {0} is a number like 30

messages.name: EldenForm_raceloc_shops
messages.explanation: When checked, shops can have important items

messages.name: EldenForm_raceloc_shopsL
messages.explanation: Further explanation for raceloc_shops. {0} is a nubmer like 30. This option does not include shops which only sell sorceries or incantations
messages.english_text: {0} checks. Does not include spell shops
messages.text: {0}个点位。不包括魔法/祷告商店

messages.name: EldenForm_raceloc_talisman
messages.explanation: When checked, certain treasures/chests can have important items. These are all of the places which originally had talismans in the unmodified (vanilla) game, which are usually hidden in interesting places.

messages.name: EldenForm_raceloc_talismanL
messages.explanation: Further explanation for raceloc_talisman. {0} is a number like 30. This value depends on the nocaves option. Again this is only from corpses/chests/etc, not bosses or other enemies.
messages.english_text: Approx {0} checks. Excludes talismans dropped by enemies
messages.text: {0}个点位。不包括敌人掉落的护符

messages.name: EldenForm_racemode
messages.explanation: When checked, important items can be found in all of the places key items can normally be found in the unmodified (vanilla) game. This option cannot be disabled
messages.text: 原本有关键物品的位置（暂无法禁用）

messages.name: EldenForm_racemode_health
messages.explanation: Response to healthGroup (Upgrade Bell Bearings randomized?) which only places them in important locations

messages.name: EldenForm_racemode_upgrades
messages.explanation: Response to healthGroup (Flask upgrades randomized?) which only places Golden Seeds/Sacred Tears in important locations

messages.name: EldenForm_racemodeL
messages.explanation: Further explanation for 'Vanilla locations for key items', {0} is a number like 15

messages.name: EldenForm_randomize
messages.explanation: Same as randomizeNew

messages.name: EldenForm_randomizeBoth
messages.explanation: Randomize button when itemPage and enemyPage are both checked

messages.name: EldenForm_randomizedFixed
messages.explanation: Randomize button when a seed number is provided and 'Reroll seed' is unchecked

messages.name: EldenForm_randomizedFixed
messages.explanation: Randomize button when a seed is filled in and 'Reroll seed' and 'Reroll enemy seed' are unchecked. 'Set seed' means 'fixed seed', a seed number provided by the user

messages.name: EldenForm_randomizeEnemy
messages.explanation: Randomize button when only enemyPage is checked

messages.name: EldenForm_randomizeEnemyOnly
messages.explanation: Randomize button when 'Reroll seed' is unchecked and 'Reroll enemy seed' is checked

messages.name: EldenForm_randomizeItem
messages.explanation: Randomize button when only itemPage is checked

messages.name: EldenForm_randomizeItemOnly
messages.explanation: Randomize button when 'Reroll seed' is checked and 'Reroll enemy seed' is unchecked

messages.name: EldenForm_randomizeNew
messages.explanation: Randomize button when 'Reroll seed' is checked (generates a new seed with new placements etc.)

messages.name: EldenForm_randomizeNothing
messages.explanation: Randomize button when neither itemPage nor enemyPage are checked. Just shows ??? since there's nothing to randomize.

messages.name: EldenForm_regularhp
messages.explanation: Checkbox, the opposite of bosshp. When normal enemies walking around the world turn into bosses, their HP is reduced by a constant factor.
messages.english_text: Reduce HP for bosses as regular enemies
messages.text: 降低常规敌人作为BOSS时的生命值

messages.name: EldenForm_resetOptions
messages.explanation: Prompt to confirm resetting all options
messages.text: 将设置重置为默认设置？

messages.name: EldenForm_resetOptionsToolStripMenuItem
messages.explanation: Action in Options menu to reset randomizer options

messages.name: EldenForm_restoreAlertTitle
messages.explanation: Title of window that pops up to restore files

messages.name: EldenForm_restoreButton
messages.explanation: Button in the randomizer you can click to restore backup files

messages.name: EldenForm_restoreConfirmTitle
messages.explanation: Title of window that pops up to prompt you to restore backup files. Followed by a list of .randobak files to restore

messages.name: EldenForm_restoreErrorBadExe
messages.explanation: Validation error in 'Restore backups' flow where the game exe does not exist and the game directory cannot be found

messages.name: EldenForm_restoreFileFailure
messages.explanation: Restore error for a specific .randobak file, {0} is its path

messages.name: EldenForm_restoreFileSuccess
messages.explanation: Successful restore for a specific .randobak file, {0} is its path

messages.name: EldenForm_restoreNothingToDo
messages.explanation: Alert in 'Restore backups' flow when you click the button and it doesn't find anything to restore

messages.name: EldenForm_restoreUXMFileBackupsToolStripMenuItem
messages.explanation: Action in File menu to open 'restore backups' dialog box

messages.name: EldenForm_runereq
messages.explanation: When checked, shows the message 'You require more Great Runes' when you try to access Radagon
messages.english_text: Require all 7 Great Runes to access the final boss
messages.text: 需集齐7个大卢恩才能挑战最终BOSS

messages.name: EldenForm_runereqL
messages.explanation: Further explanation for runereq. You must find the rune items, but you don't need to go to Divine Towers to make them equippable
messages.english_text: Activating the Great Runes is not required

messages.name: EldenForm_runError
messages.explanation: Generic randomizer error, {0} is the detailed error message. Also points the user to the spoiler_logs directory
messages.english_text:
Error encountered: {0}
It may work to try again with a different seed. See most recent file in spoiler_logs directory for the full error.
messages.text:
遇到错误：{0}
可以使用其他种子重试。详细内容见spoiler_logs目录中最新文件。

messages.name: EldenForm_runErrorGeneric
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar when miscalleneous pre-randomization errors occur

messages.name: EldenForm_runErrorStatus
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar when randomizer files for any reason. {0} is a file name in the spoiler_logs directory
messages.english_text: Error! Partial log in spoiler_logs directory as {0}
messages.text: 错误！查看spoiler_logs目录下{0}文件以获取部分日志

messages.name: EldenForm_runes_endL
messages.explanation: Label which appears after a dropdown with values from 0-7. It describes the count of how many Great Runes are required to enter the Erdtrefe, previously the runereq option
messages.english_text: Great Runes to access the final boss
messages.text: 挑战最终BOSS所需大卢恩数量

messages.name: EldenForm_runes_leyndellL
messages.explanation: Label which appears after a dropdown with values from 0-7. It describes the count of how many Great Runes are required to remove the golden seal before Leyndell, which is normally 2.
messages.text: 进入王城所需大卢恩数量

messages.name: EldenForm_runes_roldL
messages.explanation: Label which appears after a dropdown with values form 0-7, and a blank value. When not blank, it requires the given number of Great Runes to use Rold Medallion to reach Mountaintops of the Giants and beat the game.
messages.text: 前往雪山所需大卢恩数量

messages.name: EldenForm_runes_roldL2
messages.explanation: Further label for the runes_rold dropdown, which indicates that Rold Medallion is no longer required to use Grand Lift of Rold and that the player should not try to search for it if they are using this feature. If there's not enough space, the 'only Great Runes' part is not as important
messages.english_text: If selected, Rold Medallion is not required, only Great Runes
messages.text: ↑如点选该项，则无需洛德符节，仅需满足大卢恩数量

messages.name: EldenForm_running
messages.explanation: Text that replaces the 'Randomize' button when randomization is running

messages.name: EldenForm_runSuccess
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar when randomization finishes. {0} is a file name in the spoiler_logs directory
messages.english_text: Done! Hints and spoilers in spoiler_logs directory as {0} - Restart your game!!
messages.text: 随机完成！提示和剧透内容见spoiler_logs目录中的{0} ——重新启动你的游戏！！

messages.name: EldenForm_saveOptionsFileToolStripMenuItem
messages.explanation: Action in Options menu to select a filename to store current randomizer options. These can be shared with other people.

messages.name: EldenForm_saveOptionsFileToolStripMenuItem
messages.explanation: Action in Options menu to select a filename to store current randomizer options. These can be shared with other people.

messages.name: EldenForm_scale
messages.explanation: When checked, increases or decreases enemy stats (HP/health they have, and how much damage they deal) using scaling
messages.text: 按地区倍率提高/降低敌人的生命值/伤害

messages.name: EldenForm_scalerandom
messages.explanation: Custom preset option which scales enemies to a random tier, rather than based on where they're placed

messages.name: EldenForm_scaleup
messages.explanation: Custom preset option which never scales enemies down. They either remain at their current level or are scaled up based on their destination.

messages.name: EldenForm_seedError
messages.explanation: Error shown in the status bar when trying to randomize with an invalid seed (not a number, too many digits, etc.)

messages.name: EldenForm_setOptionsStringToolStripMenuItem
messages.explanation: Action in Options menu to open OptionsForm to copy-paste a simple string with most options in the form (but not other things like presets)
messages.text: 由文本字符串设置表单选项...

messages.name: EldenForm_sombermode
messages.explanation: Option which changes required amount of Smithing Stones to upgrade a weapon which uses regular Smithing Stones. Weapons which use Somber Smithing Stones are unchanged.
messages.english_text: Reduce upgrade cost for non-somber weapons
messages.text: 降低非失色武器的强化成本

messages.name: EldenForm_sombermodeL
messages.explanation: More details about sombermode. Instead of upgrades requiring 2-4-6 of any Smithing Stone, it is changed to 1-1-1 (from 97 in total, to 25 in total).
messages.english_text: Require only one Smithing Stone per weapon level
messages.text: 普通武器每次强化只需要1块锻造石

messages.name: EldenForm_specialGroup
messages.explanation: Label for Misc Options options group, to select options which change randomizer behavior for special reasons

messages.name: EldenForm_spellshops
messages.explanation: When checked, shops which normally have sorceries/incantations get random sorceries/incantations
messages.text: 魔法/祷告商店仍出售魔法/祷告

messages.name: EldenForm_spellshopsL
messages.explanation: Further explanation of spellshops: sorcery shops only get sorceries, and incantation shops only get incantations
messages.english_text: Place sorceries/incantations in shops of that type
messages.text: 将魔法/祷告置于对应类型商店

messages.name: EldenForm_status
messages.explanation: Default status bar text. {0} is replaced with credits sentence, and {1} is replaced by a number called the config hash. This is a 5-digit number which depends on the exact set of options the user has enabled.

messages.name: EldenForm_status_credits
messages.explanation: Mod creation credits, {0} is the developer username

messages.name: EldenForm_status_creditsWithTranslators
messages.explanation: Mod creation credits including translators, {0} is the developer username and {1} comes from the 'translators' field

messages.name: EldenForm_swapboss
messages.explanation: When checked, randomized multi-boss fights can have different types of bosses. For instance, instead of two Crystalians, you might get a Crystalian and a Watchdog.

messages.name: EldenForm_swapbossL
messages.explanation: Clarification to swapboss option that it only works for mini-dungeon (caves, catacombs, etc.) bosses
messages.text: 仅适用小型箱庭BOSS(洞窟、地下墓地等)

messages.name: EldenForm_swaprewards
messages.explanation: When bosses are randomized, changes their rune drop amounts. For instance, if Malenia is in Margit's arena, her runes will be based on her original amount but scaled down from Malenia's level to Margit's level
messages.english_text: Change boss runes to correspond to the original boss
messages.text: 令BOSS掉落卢恩数量与当前区域原始BOSS相符

messages.name: EldenForm_updateButton
messages.explanation: Button which opens the randomizer files page, to allow easy checks for newer versions of the randomizer

messages.name: EldenForm_upgradeExplainL
messages.explanation: Long explanation for how randomizing upgrade material Bell Bearings work (for Smithing Stones, Somber Smithing Stones, Grave Glovewort, and Ghost Glovewort). See mod page for more details
messages.english_text: If randomized, Smithing Stone and Glovewort Bell Bearings are placed in the same overall area as their vanilla location. Their contents are not randomized.
messages.text:
随机之后，锻造石/铃兰铃珠将出现在原本所在位置的相同区域内。
PS：铃珠所对应的出售物品不会随机。

messages.name: EldenForm_upgradeGroup
messages.explanation: Label asking how to randomize Bell Bearings with upgrade materials, like Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing [1]

messages.name: EldenForm_uxm
messages.explanation: Checkbox to write randomized files to UXM. If unchecked, it assumes Mod Engine installation

messages.name: EldenForm_versionMismatch
messages.explanation: Yes/no confirmation prompt when loading an options file. {0} and {1} are the randomizer version names, like v0.1. The different output refers to how the same set of randomizer options, at different versions of the randomizer, may result in different item/enemy placements.
messages.english_text: Mismatched options versions! File has version {0}, but current randomizer version is {1}. This may result in different output. Try to continue anyway?
messages.text: 设置版本不匹配！文件版本为{0}，但当前随机化生成器版本为{1}。这可能导致输出不同。是否仍要继续？

messages.name: EldenForm_weaponprogression
messages.explanation: Checkbox to make Smithing Stones more likely to be available in early/late areas depending on their type. This affects the placement and distribution of Smithing Stones, so that you can upgrade your weapon like in the unmodified game. You will be able to reliably find tiers 1 to 3 in Limgrave and Liurnia. Otherwise, finding upgrade materials may be much more difficult.
messages.english_text: Smithing Stone availability similar to base game
messages.text: 与原始游戏类似的锻造石分布

messages.name: EldenForm_weaponreqs
messages.explanation: Checkbox to make all weapons in the game wieldable regardless of stats
messages.english_text: Remove all weapon and spell requirements
messages.text: 移除所有武器与魔法/祷告的属性要求

messages.name: EnemyClass_AdjustSourceDoc
messages.explanation: Explanation for how to configure Frequency Adjustments, which appears in the enemy customization form. Reducing passive enemy types is an example of this. If crabs start with a 5% chance to show up, and their frequency adjustment is 50%, they will end up with a 2.5% chance.
messages.english_text: Special configuration to adjust the frequency of enemies relative to others of the same type
messages.text: 调整敌人相对于同类型敌人出现频率的特别配置

messages.name: EnemyClass_AdjustSourceDoc
messages.explanation: Explanation for how to configure Frequency Adjustments, which appears in the enemy customization form. Reducing passive enemy types is an example of this. If crabs start with a 5% chance to show up, and their frequency adjustment is 50%, they will end up with a 2.5% chance.
messages.english_text: Special configuration to reduce the frequency of certain enemies relative to others in the same category. Use the + button to add an adjustment. For example, setting crabs to 50% will cut their chance of appearing by half.
messages.text: 独立配置以减少某些敌人相对于同类其他敌人的出现频率。使用加号按钮添加单独的调整项。例如：将螃蟹设置为50%将使它们出现的几率减少一半。

messages.name: EnemyClass_Basic
messages.explanation: Enemy category for most of the normal non-boss enemies encountered in the game

messages.name: EnemyClass_BasicDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for Regular Enemies when customizing enemies
messages.english_text: Enemies not covered by other categories
messages.text: 其他类别未涵盖的敌人

messages.name: EnemyClass_Boss
messages.explanation: Enemy category for the most important bosses in the game

messages.name: EnemyClass_BossDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for Major Bosses
messages.english_text: Unescapable boss encounters with achievements or story importance
messages.text: 无法避开的成就BOSS或者存在剧情重要性的BOSS

messages.name: EnemyClass_DragonMiniboss
messages.explanation: Enemy category for dragons with boss healthbars in the world

messages.name: EnemyClass_Evergaol
messages.explanation: Enemy category for enemies fought in Evergaols, like the Crucible Knight in Stormhill

messages.name: EnemyClass_HostileNPC
messages.explanation: Enemy category for NPCs which fight you, including those who invade you or that you can invade

messages.name: EnemyClass_HostileNPCDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for Hostile Humans. Notably it includes NPCs like Millicent and Sellen, because they appear multiple times in different locations, and it would be confusing to randomize them.
messages.english_text: Invaders and hostile NPCs without extensive quests
messages.text: 没有长任务链(出现于多个位置)的入侵与敌对NPC

messages.name: EnemyClass_Miniboss
messages.explanation: Enemy category for enemies with boss healthbars wandering the game world, not covered by other miniboss categories

messages.name: EnemyClass_MinibossDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for World Minibosses
messages.english_text: Enemies with boss healthbars in the open world

messages.name: EnemyClass_MinorBoss
messages.explanation: Enemy category for boss encounters, usually with fog gates, including those in side dungeons (mini-dungeons)

messages.name: EnemyClass_MinorBossDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for Minor Bosses. Compare with the explanation for Major Bosses
messages.english_text: Other unescapable boss encounters, including side dungeon bosses
messages.text: 其余无法避开的BOSS，包括支线小型箱庭BOSS(通常有雾门)

messages.name: EnemyClass_NightMiniboss
messages.explanation: Enemy category for minibosses which roam the world at night

messages.name: EnemyClass_NightMinibossDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for Night Minibosses
messages.english_text: Minibosses which only spawn at night

messages.name: EnemyClass_Scarab
messages.explanation: Enemy category for scarabs (crystal lizard-like enemies)

messages.name: EnemyClass_Spectator
messages.explanation: Special enemy category which overlaps with other categories: enemies nearby bosses who are watching/spectating, and shouldn't be too powerful or else it will easily turn into a multi-boss fight.

messages.name: EnemyClass_SpectatorDesc
messages.explanation: Explanation for configuring Spectators
messages.english_text: Special configuration for regular enemies who are nearby minibosses. This is meant to prevent unreasonably difficult open world fights.
messages.text:
靠近BOSS的常规敌人的特别配置。此项是为了防止不合理的野外战斗。
这类敌人过于强大的话，很容易演变成复数BOSS战斗。

messages.name: EnemyClass_Wildlife
messages.explanation: Enemy category for Wildlife who generally don't attack the player, like sheep and birds

messages.name: EnemyClassGroup_AllBosses
messages.explanation: Meta-category which includes all other specific boss types, simply called Bosses

messages.name: EnemyClassGroup_AllBosses
messages.explanation: Meta-category which includes all other specific boss types, simply called Bosses

messages.name: EnemyClassGroup_AllDragons
messages.explanation: Meta-category which includes all dragons, both minibosses and regular enemies

messages.name: EnemyClassGroup_AllEnemies
messages.explanation: Meta-category which includes literally all randomizable enemies

messages.name: EnemyClassGroup_AllEnemies
messages.explanation: Meta-category which includes literally all randomizable enemies

messages.name: GameMenu_fogRunningError
messages.explanation:
Dialog message which appears in-game when Fog Gate Randomizer option is enabled, but the user attempted to launch Item/Enemy Randomizer without actually running Fog Gate Randomizer. The 
 is a line break. When Fog Gate Randomizer runs, it removes this error message.
messages.english_text:
Error: Unrestricted item placement was enabled in Item Randomizer,
but Fog Gate Randomizer was not detected
messages.text:
错误：在物品随机生成器中启用了物品摆放位置不受限制，
但未检测到雾门随机生成器。

messages.name: GameMenu_hintItemLabel
messages.explanation: Label placed in the in-game map, which includes an item name {0} and area name {1} with its exact location. For example: Talisman Pouch in Altus Plateau

messages.name: GameMenu_hintItemLabelArea
messages.explanation: Label placed in the in-game map for non-exact hints, with the item name {0} and vague area name {1}. For example: Sacred Tear somewhere in Lake of Rot

messages.name: GameMenu_hintLabelArea
messages.explanation: Label placed in the map for non-exact hints. For instance, 'Somewhere in Volcano Manor' is marked on the map to refer to any item location there. The location names are in the native language for each game language

messages.name: GameMenu_hintMarkArea
messages.explanation: Dialog option which appears in-game when the player purchases a hint, to mark the overall area (like Limgrave) of a required item on the map
messages.text: 标记所需物品所在区域

messages.name: GameMenu_hintMarkArea
messages.explanation: Dialog option which appears in-game when the player purchases a hint, to mark the overall area (like Limgrave) of a required item on the map
messages.english_text: Mark a required item's overall area
messages.text: 标记所需物品的大体区域（比如宁姆格福）

messages.name: GameMenu_hintMarkItem
messages.explanation: Dialog option which appears in-game when the player purchases a hint, to mark the exact location (like the corpse or boss to defeat) of a required item on the map
messages.english_text: Mark a required item's exact location (more expensive)
messages.text: 标记所需物品的明确位置（价格更高）

messages.name: GameMenu_hintNoItems
messages.explanation: Dialog message which appears in-game when the user tries to purchase a hint, but all items seem to be acquired

messages.name: GameMenu_hintNoUpgradeItems
messages.explanation: Dialog message which appears in-game when the user tries to purchase a hint for an upgrade item (not a key item, but something like a Bell Bearing), but all items have been required

messages.name: GameMenu_hintPurchase
messages.explanation: Option in Kalé's NPC menu to purchase a map marker for a required item hint, added below the existing 'Purchase' option

messages.name: GameMenu_hintRequiredItem
messages.explanation: Generic name for a required item, to be shown in the map for required item hints. This would be used as the {0} name in hintItemLabel, so the final label would be: Required item in Volcano Manor

messages.name: GameMenu_hintRequirementFailed
messages.explanation: Dialog message which appears in-game when the user tries to purchase a hint, but hint functionality is not available yet (they need to rest at an Altus Plateau Site of Grace first)
messages.english_text: Get to the Altus Plateau first!

messages.name: GameMenu_hintRequirementFailedBoss
messages.explanation: Message shown in game when trying to select hintMarkItem, but the area boss was not defeated. This is a precaution to prevent people repeatedly getting hints without actually getting strong or fighting enemies. They can still get a non-exact hint in this case (hintMarkArea)
messages.english_text:
Exact location hints in an area are only
available after defeating the area's main boss.
messages.text: 只有在击败该区域的主要BOSS之后，才能获得该区域的明确位置标记。

messages.name: GameMenu_hintRequirementFailedOption
messages.explanation: Message shown in game when trying to select hintMarkItem, but the option for exact location hints was unchecked
messages.english_text: The randomizer option for exact location hints was not enabled.
messages.text: 随机生成器关于明确位置标记的设置未启用。

messages.name: GameMenu_hintUpgradePurchase
messages.explanation: Option given in Kalé's NPC menu to purchase a map marker for a specific ugprade item, which can be selected from a list. Examples of these items: Talisman Pouch, Sacred Tear, Smithing Stone Bell Bearing. These give hints for items from early game to late game, depending on which ones have already been acquired.

messages.name: GameMenu_receiveBellBearing
messages.explanation: Option added to merchants in-game, alongside Purchase/Sell menus, which gives the player their Bell Bearing without killing them

messages.name: GameMenu_restart
messages.explanation: Error message shown in-game when the randomizer can load all required files. It normally happens if someone re-runs randomizer without restarting the game, but it can also happen after game updates if the regulation.bin becomes invalid and no longer loads.
messages.english_text:
Error: Mismatch between regulation.bin and other randomizer files.
Restart the game and make sure the game and randomizer versions are compatible.
messages.text:
错误：regulation.bin与其他随机生成器文件不匹配。
重启游戏并确保游戏与随机生成器的版本兼容。

messages.name: GameMenu_restart
messages.explanation:
Error message shown in-game when the randomizer can load all required files. The 
 corresponds to a line change. This normally happens if someone re-runs randomizer without restarting the game, but it can also happen after game updates if the regulation.bin becomes invalid and no longer loads. Finally, it can happen if the randomizer is incorrectly installed, and some critical files are detected as missing.
messages.english_text:
Error: Mismatch between regulation.bin and other randomizer files.
Make sure all randomizer files are present, the game has been restarted
after randomization, and the game and regulation.bin versions are compatible.
messages.text:
错误：regulation.bin与其他随机生成器文件不匹配。
确保所有随机生成器文件目前存在，游戏在随机化之后已经重启，
以及游戏与随机生成器的版本兼容。

messages.name: MergeModForm_clear
messages.explanation: Button in 'Merge other mod' which clears the merged mod textbox

messages.name: MergeModForm_dir
messages.explanation: Button in 'Merge other mod' which prompts selecting a mod directory

messages.name: MergeModForm_MergeModForm
messages.explanation: Title of 'Merge other mod' dialog box

messages.name: MergeModForm_reg
messages.explanation: Button in 'Merge other mod' which prompts selecting a regulation.bin file

messages.name: MergeModForm_toml
messages.explanation: Button in 'Merge other mod' which prompts selecting a toml file, such as Mod Engine's config_eldenring.toml file, which contains a list of mods to launch. This allows merging multiple mods into randomizer.

messages.name: OptionsForm_errorInternal
messages.explanation: Internal error for 'Set options from string', when it somehow starts out with invalid options

messages.name: OptionsForm_errorNoOptions
messages.explanation: Validation error for 'Set options from string' when no actual option names are provided, only a number
messages.text: 无效设置：必须包含选项

messages.name: OptionsForm_errorNoVersion
messages.explanation: Validation error for 'Set options from string', when the given value doesn't contain an option named v1 v2 etc.
messages.english_text: Invalid options: must contain a version number
messages.text: 无效设置：必须包含版本号

messages.name: OptionsForm_OptionsForm
messages.explanation: Title for 'Set options from string' dialog box

messages.name: OptionsForm_select
messages.explanation: Button in 'Set options from string' dialog box which sets options based on the textbox contents

messages.name: OptionsForm_strL
messages.explanation: Long explanation for using 'Set options from string' dialog box. The text box shows the user's current 'option string' (all of their selected options and seed)
messages.english_text:
This text box allows you to give your options and seed to someone else (after running randomization) and to copy someone else's options.
This string can also be found on the first line of hint/spoiler logs in the spoiler_logs directory.
Also, you can set it to blank to restore all default options.
messages.text:
①该文本框允许你将自己的设置与种子分享给其他人(在运行随机化结束后)以及复制别人的设置。
②该字符串也能在spoiler_logs目录里提示/剧透日志中的第一行找到。
③清空文本框可以恢复默认设置。

messages.name: Preset_adjustSource
messages.explanation: Summary of a Frequency Adjustment. {0} is a percent number (so 'Adjusted to 50%' means cut in half) and {1} is a list of enemies affected

messages.name: Preset_dontRandomize
messages.explanation: Summary of not-randomized enemies. {0} is a list of enemies who are not randomized

messages.name: Preset_enemyMultiplier
messages.explanation: Enemy multiplier mode, a type of run where {0} is a number like 2 or 3. It is based on a DS3 mod where every enemy is doubled or tripled. To be implemented

messages.name: Preset_enemyMultiplierDesc
messages.explanation: Enemy category description with an multiplier added, used when Enemy Onslaught is enabled and has an override for a specific category. {0} is a number like 2 or 3, {1} is a class like Major Bosses. All together, this would result in something like '2x Major Bosses'

messages.name: Preset_oopsAll
messages.explanation: Oops All mode, where all enemies are replaced with the enemy named in {0}. The phrase is based on an American cereal https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/oops-all-berries-box-parodies, and in this case, DS1 enemy randomizer runs by streamer LobosJr where he was constantly running into enemies who turned into Gwyn.

messages.name: Preset_options
messages.explanation: Summary of custom options enabled for the preset, where {0} is a comma-separated list of preset options. This is currently not used, since the options are just listed one-by-one

messages.name: Preset_poolDefault
messages.explanation: When listing customized enemies getting replaced, refers to enemies in the same category. 'Replacing Major Bosses: Themselves' means that major bosses will replace other major bosses

messages.name: Preset_poolDelimitEntry
messages.explanation: Separation text between different enemies in a list (like 'Rat; Dog'). This shouldn't be a comma, since enemy names can contain commas

messages.name: Preset_poolDelimitType
messages.explanation: Separation text between different enemy categories in a list (like 'Major Bosses, Minor Bosses')

messages.name: Preset_poolDesc
messages.explanation: Summary of customization for an enemy category, shown in {0}, where the description is on the next line.

messages.name: Preset_poolDescInherit
messages.explanation: Summary of customization for an enemy category, shown in {0}, where it uses the same logic as a different enemy category in {1}. This is not currently shown, since it's duplicated instead.

messages.name: Preset_poolDescOneLine
messages.explanation: Summary of customization for an enemy category all on one line. You might have 'Replacing Major Bosses: Rat; Dog', which means that every major boss will turn into either a rat or a dog

messages.name: Preset_poolEntries
messages.explanation: Part of multiline summary for enemy category customization. The - is a bullet point, then it might say '50% Dog'. All the different lines add up to 100%.

messages.name: Preset_poolExclude
messages.explanation: Part of multiline summary for enemy category customization. The - is a bullet point, and {0} is a list of enemy types which are not allowed to appear in this category. (excluding Dragons) means that dragons may not appear in this category, though it may appear in other categories

messages.name: Preset_poolNorandom
messages.explanation: Description for an enemy category which is not randomized. Appears like 'Replacing Scarabs: Not randomized'

messages.name: Preset_presetName
messages.explanation: The name of the customization preset, 'Custom' by default. This corresponds to the preset's filename

messages.name: Preset_removeSource
messages.explanation: {0} is a list of enemies which are not allowed to appear anywhere in the game

messages.name: PresetEditForm_adjustSource
messages.explanation: Special enemy category for adjusting enemy frequency, in the customization form. See EnemyClass_AdjustSourceDoc

messages.name: PresetEditForm_applyButton
messages.explanation: Button which saves changes but does not close the form

messages.name: PresetEditForm_classCustom
messages.explanation: Option for an enemy category to get replaced with custom configuration

messages.name: PresetEditForm_classInherit
messages.explanation: Option for an enemy category to use the same replacement logic as its parent category

messages.name: PresetEditForm_classInheritName
messages.explanation: Same as classInherit, but includes the name of the parent category, given in {0}

messages.name: PresetEditForm_classInheritName
messages.explanation: Version of classInherit which includes the name of the parent category, given in {0}

messages.name: PresetEditForm_classMerge
messages.explanation: Option for an enemy category to get merged into its parent class. For instance, if Minor Bosses is merged into its parent (Major Bosses), all of the bosses will be randomized with each other, instead of in separate categories

messages.name: PresetEditForm_classMergeName
messages.explanation: Version of classMerge which includes the name of the parent category

messages.name: PresetEditForm_classNorandom
messages.explanation: Option for an enemy category to not get randomized

messages.name: PresetEditForm_classRandom
messages.explanation: Option for an enemy category to get randomized. This is mainly for when customization is not available, only basic shuffling

messages.name: PresetEditForm_classRemoveSource
messages.explanation: Label for a list of enemies to exclude from the current enemy category

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmLeave
messages.explanation: Dialog text when closing the preset form or switching to a different preset without saving. Shows Yes/No/Cancel

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmMultiplyRandom
messages.explanation: Yes/no prompt which is shown when switching from normal randomization to enemy onslaught (multiplied enemies). When Yes is chosen, enemy randomization is temporarily disabled, meaning that the original enemy will just be copied instead of copied *and* randomized
messages.english_text: Disable enemy randomization with Enemy Onslaught?
messages.text: 是否以禁用敌人随机的方式启用敌人倍增模式？

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmNorandom
messages.explanation: Yes/no prompt which appears when trying to add 'Not randomized' to a custom enemy category. One way to make this appear is to edit custom enemy placement, click Reset, select the dropdown next to the '100%' textbox, and select 'Not randomized' from the dropdown. The 'Not randomized' selection is a way to not randomize a % of enemies, and it makes no sense for a group to both specify source enemies and say that none should be randomized. If the user clicks Yes, the editor automatically clicks the + button to make a new group and adds 'Not randomized' there.
messages.english_text: "Not randomized" can't be added to this source group because other enemies are already configured. Would you like to create a new group to set a percentage for non-random enemies?
messages.text: 无法添加到此“不随机”分组，因为已经配置了其他敌人。您想创建一个新分组来设置不随机敌人的百分比吗？

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmOverwrite
messages.explanation: Dialog text for 'Save as' or 'Create new' when the preset filename already exists

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmReset
messages.explanation: Dialog text for Reset button in preset form, which confirms that the existing preset should be reverted to default
messages.text: 将该预设重置为默认值？

messages.name: PresetEditForm_confirmTitle
messages.explanation: Generic title for confirm dialog box

messages.name: PresetEditForm_createNew
messages.explanation: In the 'Preset:' dropdown, a special option which prompts the name of a new preset to create

messages.name: PresetEditForm_customHelpText
messages.explanation: Long explanation for using the custom enemy editor which can be accessed by clicking on the '?' link in a particular enemy category. This refers to other parts of the UI which have their own entries. Please ask me if you'd like further explanation for any of this, since this text tries to communicate how the randomizer works internally, which is complicated, and how to configure it, which is also complicated.
messages.english_text:
Enemy randomizer works by swapping out enemies with other enemies taken from elsewhere in the game. It does this independently for each enemy category. Here you can configure a custom list of source enemies which can replace enemies in this category. You can also merge some categories together, by selecting "Merge with" in subcategories, or clicking on "Quick edit" links below to do this automatically.

When configuring source enemies, you can click the + button to add a new source group. The % probability across all groups in a category must add up to 100%. If you want 10% of enemies in this category to become any boss, use a 90% group with "Same category" and a 10% group with "All Bosses". If you want only 50% of enemies in this category to be randomized, use a 50% group with "Same category" and a 50% group with "Not randomized".
messages.text:
敌人随机生成器的工作原理是将敌人与游戏中其他地方的敌人进行交换。它针对不同敌人类别分别进行交换。您可以在此处自定义可替换此类别中敌人的来源敌人列表。您还可以将某些类别合并在一起，方法是在子类别中选择“合并”，或单击下面的“快速编辑”链接自动执行此操作。

配置来源敌人时，您可以单击加号按钮添加新的来源分组。类别中所有分组的概率百分比之和必须为100%。 如果您希望该类别中10%的敌人成为任意Boss，请设置一个“同类别”的分组到90%以及“类别Boss”的分组到10%。 如果您只希望此类别中的50%敌人被随机化，请设置一个“同类别”的分组到50%以及“不随机”的分组到50%。

messages.name: PresetEditForm_descriptionL
messages.explanation: Label for a textbox where a preset description can be typed, mainly as an explanation when giving the preset file to other people to use

messages.name: PresetEditForm_directoryButton
messages.explanation: Button in the preset dialog box which just opens the directory named 'presets', creating it if it doesn't exist

messages.name: PresetEditForm_dontRandomize
messages.explanation: Label for enemies which are not randomized at all, and do not turn into anything else

messages.name: PresetEditForm_enterName
messages.explanation: After 'Save as' or 'Create new' is selected, the prompt for a textbox to enter a simple short name. This will be used as the filename.

messages.name: PresetEditForm_errorTitle
messages.explanation: Generic title for dialog box reporting a user error

messages.name: PresetEditForm_invalidName
messages.explanation: Error shown when the user entered an invalid preset name. {0} is the name they entered

messages.name: PresetEditForm_loadFailure
messages.explanation: Error shown when selecting a preset, but it can't be parsed or doesn't exist. {0} is the preset name, and {1} on the next line is the full error message

messages.name: PresetEditForm_modeCustom
messages.explanation: Normal mode for customization which is not one of the special modes

messages.name: PresetEditForm_modeMultiply
messages.explanation: Dropdown label for special mode (not yet implemented) which duplicates all enemies. See Preset_enemyMultiplier

messages.name: PresetEditForm_modeOopsall
messages.explanation: Dropdown label for special mode which turns all enemies into the same type. See Preset_oopsAll

messages.name: PresetEditForm_multiplyOption
messages.explanation: Textbox for Enemy Onslaught mode where {0} is a number like 2 or 3, indicating double or triple enemies.

messages.name: PresetEditForm_okButton
messages.explanation: Button which saves changes and closes the form

messages.name: PresetEditForm_poolDefault
messages.explanation: Type of enemy replacement within the same category, so for Major Bosses, this means other Major Bosses. This is same thing as 'Themselves' in Preset_poolDefault, but it's in an enemy list editor and not in a summary

messages.name: PresetEditForm_poolDefaultExplain
messages.explanation: Type of enemy replacement within the same category, so for Major Bosses, this means other Major Bosses. This shows up in the enemy editor for each enemy category with custom source groups. The {0} is the name of the current category. The reason why this is used, instead of just saying the category name by itself, is because of the 'Copy config from <other category>' option. For example, suppose that Regular Enemies are replaced with Same category (Regular Enemies). If Passive Wildlife copies its config from Regular Enemies, then it will be replaced with Same category (Passive Wildlife) instead, because the meaning of the current category is different there.

messages.name: PresetEditForm_poolEnemies
messages.explanation: Percent sign which appears after a textbox with a number from 0 to 100

messages.name: PresetEditForm_PresetEditForm
messages.explanation: Title of the customization form

messages.name: PresetEditForm_presetL
messages.explanation: Label for dropdown with different existing presets, including the 'Create new' option

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickL
messages.explanation: Label for several links which do some customization configuration automatically. These links edit the preset and are meant to be quick/convenient for the user.

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickMergeAll
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes all enemy categories to merge with parent, making everything randomized with each other

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickMergeAll
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes all enemy categories to merge with parent, making everything randomized with each other

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickMergeBoss
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes all boss enemy categories to merge with parent, making bosses randomized with each other

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickMergeBoss
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes all boss enemy categories to merge with parent, making bosses randomized with each other

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickMergeMinor
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes boss categories other than Major Bosses to merge with each other. This makes it so that Major Bosses are still challenging, but other bosses have more variety

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickMergeOverworld
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes overworld boss categories (world minibosses, night minibosses, etc.) to merge with parent, making them randomized with each other
messages.text: 合并野外精英BOSS及其子类

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickReducePassive
messages.explanation: Quick edit which makes harmless enemies less common, so that more interesting and aggressive enemies can take their place
messages.text: 降低无害敌人出现频率

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickReplace10
messages.explanation: Quick edit which adds 10% boss replacement to the regular enemy category, if it's not there already
messages.english_text: Replace 10% of regular enemies with bosses
messages.text: 用全类别BOSS替换10%的常规敌人

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickReplaceWildlife
messages.explanation: Quick edit which changes the wildlife category to be 100% regular enemies, instead of the default of other wildlife
messages.text: 用常规敌人替换野生动物

messages.name: PresetEditForm_quickSeparate
messages.explanation: Quick edit which is the opposite of quickMerge options. It changes all categories to not merge with parent.

messages.name: PresetEditForm_removeSource
messages.explanation: Label for a list of enemies which are not added anywhere in the game

messages.name: PresetEditForm_resetButton
messages.explanation: Button shown in preset form which can revert the custom enemy placement back to the default (that is, everything randomized in separate categories)

messages.name: PresetEditForm_saveAsButton
messages.explanation: Button which prompts a new preset name and saves the current enemy customization under that file

messages.name: PresetEditForm_saveFailure
messages.explanation: Enemy customization preset save failure. {0} is the name of the preset and {1} is the full error message on the next line

messages.name: Randomizer_createFileError
messages.explanation: Long explanation of why file creation might fail. First it gives the same advice as EldenForm_fileUnpackError, then mentions that Antivirus can stop the randomizer from writing files, then explains that the randomizer is 'safe' (does not modify files unless it needs to).
messages.english_text:
Error: Failed to create file. Make sure the randomizer is unpacked to disk with all of the files kept together, and make sure no Antivirus programs are interfering. The randomizer will only modify files in its own directory or in the game directory.
{0}
messages.text:
错误：创建文件失败。确保将随机化生成器解压到磁盘，并将所有文件置于同一目录下，确保没有杀毒程序的干扰。随机化生成器只会修改本身目录和或游戏目录下的文件。
{0}

messages.name: Randomizer_editPhase
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar while the randomizer is modifying game parameters etc. to randomize them

messages.name: Randomizer_enemyPhase
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar while the randomizer is doing enemy randomization

messages.name: Randomizer_itemPhase
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar while the randomizer is doing item randomization

messages.name: Randomizer_keyItemError
messages.explanation: Error message from the randomizer which indicates an internal logic error, when has to put a key item in an area and can't find any applicable locations. This happens like 5% or 10% of the time depending on how difficult the randomization is to calculate.
messages.english_text: Could not place all key items... giving up now. This can happen on some seeds or with some options.
messages.text: 无法放置所有关键物品...正在放弃随机。可能是因为某些种子或设置所导致。

messages.name: Randomizer_loadPhase
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar at the start of randomization, when reading and parsing game files

messages.name: Randomizer_mergeMissingError
messages.explanation: Error shown when 'Merge mod directory' is selected but the directory named {0} does not exist
messages.english_text: Error merging mods: directory {0} not found
messages.text: 合并mod错误: 找不到{0}目录

messages.name: Randomizer_mergeWrongDirError
messages.explanation: Error shown when 'Merge mod directory' is selected but the randomizer is already inside of the mod directory {0}, so it would use its own output as input, which would break it
messages.english_text: Error merging mods: already running from {0} directory
messages.text: 合并mod错误: 已从{0}目录运行

messages.name: Randomizer_saveMapPhase
messages.explanation: Progress from 0% to 100% in writing game map files (.msb.dcx format), at the end of savePhase

messages.name: Randomizer_savePhase
messages.explanation: Shown in the status bar at the end of randomization, when all randomized files are written out to disk
